sentences.sContent: Some of the best services for the seniors are sponsored by philanthropic organizations.
sentences.sCn: 一些一流老人服务机构是由慈善组织资助的。

remMethod.val: phil (爱) + anthrop (人) + ic → 爱人的 → 博爱的

words.tran: 慈善家，博爱主义者；乐善好施的人

trans.tranOther: A philanthropic person or organization freely gives money or other help to people who need it
